alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 1:28AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern White, southwestern Wabash, southeastern Edwards, Warrick, Vanderburgh, Spencer, Gibson, Posey and Pike Counties through 130 AM CDT/230 AM EDT/... At 1227 AM CDT/127 AM EDT/, A gust front was located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Jasper to near Princeton to near Albion. Movement was south at 30 mph. This front is producing wind gusts to around 40 mph. A few strong storms have developed behind the front, one near Petersburg. Those storms could produce wind gusts to 50 mph or briefly become severe through early this morning. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oakland City around 1235 AM CDT. Fort Branch around 1240 AM CDT. Haubstadt around 1245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lynnville, Poseyville, Dale, New Harmony, Chandler, Melody Hill, Evansville, Boonville, Santa Claus and Blairsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 43. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 1 and 60. Interstate 64 in Illinois between Mile Markers 128 and 130. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gibson; Pike; Posey; Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick
